content: सुख [सुख्-अच्] {@--1@} Happy, delighted, joyful, pleased. {@--2@} Agreeable, sweet, charming, pleasant; दिशः प्रसेदुर्मरुतो ववुः सुखाः <ls>R. 3. 14</ls>; so मुखश्रवा निस्वनाः <ls n="R.">3. 19.</ls> {@--3@} Virtuous, pious. {@--4@} Taking delight in, favourable to; <ls>Ś. 7. 18.</ls> {@--5@} Easy, practicable; श्रेयांसि लब्धुमसुखानि विनांतरायैः <ls>Ki. 5. 49.</ls> {@--6@} Fit, suitable. --खा The capital of Varuṇa. --खं {@--1@} Happiness, joy, delight, pleasure, comfort; यदेवोपनतं दुःखात्सुखं तद्रसवत्तरं <ls>V. 3. 21.</ls> {@--2@} Prosperity; अद्वैतं सुखदुःखयोरनुगुणं सर्वास्ववस्थासु यत् <ls>U. 1. 40.</ls> {@--3@} Well-being, welfare, health; देवीं सुखं प्रष्टुं गता <ls>M. 4.</ls> {@--4@} Ease, comfort, alleviation (of sorrow &c.); <ab>oft.</ab> in <ab>comp.</ab>; as in सुखशयित, सुखोपविष्ट, सुखाश्रय &c. {@--5@} Facility, easiness, ease. {@--6@} Heaven, paradise. {@--7@} Water. --खं {%<ab>ind.</ab>%} {@--1@} Happily, joyfully. {@--2@} Well; सुखमास्तां भवात् ‘may you fare well’. {@--3@} At ease, comfortably; असंजातकिणस्कंधः सुखं स्वपिति गौर्गडिः <ls>K. P. 10.</ls> {@--4@} Easily, with ease; अज्ञः सुखमाराध्यः सुखतरमाराध्यते विशेषज्ञः <ls>Bh. 2. 3</ls>; सुखमुपदिश्यते परस्य <ls>K.</ls> {@--5@} Rather, willingly. {@--6@} Quietly, placidly.
